roleset.name: be greater than
roleset.note: ECLIPSE-V NOTES: The idea is that the darkness of the moon is greater than the light ofthe sun. (from eclipse.01-v)

example.name: metaphorical
example.text: The purchase of Nekoosa would easily eclipse Georgia-Pacific's $530 million acquisition of Brunswick Pulp& Paper Co. last year.
example.arg: Georgia-Pacific's $530 million acquisition of Brunswick Pulp& Paper Co. last year

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: No one expects minimills to eclipse major integrated steelmakers , who remain the undisputed kings of highest - quality steel used for autos and refrigerators .
example.arg: major integrated steelmakers , who remain the undisputed kings of highest - quality steel used for autos and refrigerators
